description: It is so easy to make your own peanut butter at home without additives and sugar.
keywords: Peanut butter,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Classic Crunchy Peanut Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 300g of peanuts in a high powered food processor. Blend for 3-4 minutes until crumbly, scraping down the sides as necessary. Blend for 4-5 minutes more, until smooth. Add honey and blend for 30 seconds.
Stir through the remaining peanuts and scoop into a sterilised jar.
